content: the modern ring towel holder is a free crochet pattern on my blog this beginner friendly pattern works up so quickly in single_crochet stitches worked in continuous seamless rounds of single_crochet stitches ends of the single_crochet tube are then sewn around wooden rings so easy and quick - perfect for craft fairs or gifts towels are removable for washing or changing out the towel for each season make in different colors for year round gifting complete video tutorial is also available
